summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Mr. Fallek, requesting a call to discuss the ongoing trial in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Mr. Fallek
persons.context: Recipient of an email from a prosecutor seeking to discuss the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal trial 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell' mentioned by the prosecutor.

events.title: Prosecutor contacts witness/associate
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails Mr. Fallek to request a call about the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were actively working on the Ghislaine Maxwell trial as of December 2021.
The prosecution sought to speak with an individual named Mr. Fallek in connection with the trial.
The communication is an external email from a government prosecutor, indicating ongoing investigative or preparatory work.
